Name: Cat Sorter VR
About the game: In this whimsical VR game, players have the opportunity to sort defective cats, disassemble them and rebuild them into “purfect” felines, using intuitive controls. The room-scale VR experience can be played alone or in a group, as the design allows for party gameplay with friends or family.
